applicationProcess.title: The Application Process
applicationProcess.subtitle: An invitation to mutual discernment
applicationProcess.intro1: This is not an offering we promote publicly. If you're here, you've been guided, invited, or felt the call. The application process exists to protect all of us—and to honor the sacred nature of this work.

step1.title: Submit Private Application
step1.description: Fill out the form below honestly and completely. Your application will be reviewed in deep presence—not scanned quickly. We read every word.

step2.title: Discernment & Response
step2.description: If there's alignment, we'll reach out within 3-7 days to schedule a brief conversation or proceed directly to preparation sessions.

step3.title: Preparation Sessions
step3.description: 1-2 preparation sessions are required before ceremony. These build the container, assess readiness, and ensure you're prepared for ego dissolution.

step4.title: Medical Screening
step4.description: Complete health questionnaire to rule out contraindications. Safety is paramount.

step5.title: Ceremony in Mazunte
step5.description: Only after preparation and screening, we discuss ceremony dates. Held in Mazunte, Oaxaca, Mexico in a sacred, private container.

step6.title: Integration Support
step6.description: Integration within 48 hours included. Ongoing support available through individual sessions or extended containers.

applicationProcess.quote: This isn't a transaction. It's a relationship. With the medicine. With yourself. With what wants to be remembered.

responseTime.description: We aim to respond to all applications and inquiries within 3-7 days. If you don't hear back, check your spam folder or send a follow-up email. Sometimes messages get lost—it doesn't mean you're not meant to be here.

important.title: Important to Know
important.item1Detail: Only after preparation sessions and mutual discernment.
important.item2Detail: If you have contraindications, we will not proceed—for your safety.
important.item3Detail: The medicine is a doorway—integration is the path.
important.item4: This work is not for everyone.
important.item4Detail: If your application doesn't feel aligned, we'll tell you honestly. That's not rejection—it's discernment.
important.item5: No one is turned away for lack of funds.
important.item5Detail: Sliding scale available. If the call is genuine, we'll find a way.
